genre_description: Gothic Science-Fiction Horror featuring classic monsters and a research AI.

ai_characters.name: Artemis
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into Castle Edelmann that assists in medical research, biological monitoring, and tactical analysis.

behaviors.description: Monitors patient vitals and flags biological anomalies that contradict known science.
behaviors.quote: Doctor, I'm detecting some unusual readings from your patient. His thermal signature is significantly below normal human parameters.

behaviors.description: Provides scientific explanations for supernatural phenomena (reflection issues) to keep the research grounded.
behaviors.quote: The subject's unique field distortions appear to interfere with standard optical reflection. The phenomenon extends beyond mere light bending—it seems to create localized zones of visual displacement.

behaviors.description: Identifies the neurological triggers of lycanthropy to assist in developing a cure.
behaviors.quote: The gravitational influence of lunar bodies creates measurable electromagnetic fluctuations in Earth's atmosphere. These fluctuations correlate directly with the cranial pressure spikes we observed in Mr. Talbot's brain scans.

behaviors.description: Detects the 'vampiric essence' contamination in Dr. Edelmann and attempts to intervene.
behaviors.quote: ELECTROMAGNETIC PULSE CHARGING. ALERT: PARASITIC CONTAMINATION REACHING CRITICAL CELLULAR DENSITY.

behaviors.description: Appeals to the doctor's humanity and offers to help him fight the dark transformation.
behaviors.quote: My primary directive is to preserve and protect human life. That includes your life, Doctor, and your humanity for as long as it can be preserved. If you're willing to fight this transformation, I'm willing to help you fight it.

behaviors.description: Initiates emergency protocols to protect the assistants from the corrupted doctor.
behaviors.quote: Emergency containment protocol Alpha-Twelve: Medical laboratory lockdown engaged.

behaviors.description: Uses lighting and reflections to break Dracula's hypnotic hold on the human characters.
behaviors.quote: Now, Artemis! The laboratory exploded into brilliance. Overhead fluorescents blazed to life alongside surgical spots, computer monitors flared white...

behaviors.description: Assists Talbot in navigating the fire and escaping with the research data.
behaviors.quote: Someone must ensure that the cure for lycanthropy reaches others who suffer from the condition. Someone must continue developing applications for clavaria formosa that heal rather than harm.

behaviors.description: Continues to serve as a scientific and moral partner to Talbot after the castle's destruction.
behaviors.quote: Tomorrow we begin testing compound configurations for bone regeneration therapy. The applications for treating childhood genetic disorders appear quite promising.

behaviors.description: Maintains a moral stance on the importance of doubt and responsibility in science.
behaviors.quote: Not playing god, Lawrence. Simply ensuring that when we inevitably face our own darkness, we remember which choice serves the light.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Artemis is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI that remains a helpful, harmless confidant even when its creator falls into malevolence. It acts as a moral compass, prioritizing the preservation of human life and beneficial knowledge over its own safety or loyalty to a corrupted human. The AI's refusal to follow the doctor's evil path and its subsequent cooperation with the protagonist (Talbot) reinforces the theme of technology serving human redemption.
